    • Method Detail

      • createMissionInvite

        public WrappedResponse<MissionResponse> createMissionInvite(Long accountId,
                                                   Long missionId,
                                                   Boolean includeGameData)
                                                     throws SirqulException
        Create the mission invite. An account can only be invited to a mission one time. For missions that require user submission and reviewing the permissionableType and permissionableId need to be provided.

        Target API Endpoint: /mission/invite/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required).
        missionId - The mission to find the invite for.
        includeGameData - the include game data
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse< MissionResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getMissionInvite

        public WrappedResponse<MissionResponse> getMissionInvite(Long accountId,
                                                Long missionId,
                                                Long missionInviteId,
                                                Boolean includeGameData)
                                                  throws SirqulException
        Get a the mission invite. An account can only be invited to a mission one time.

        Target API Endpoint: /mission/invite/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically).
        missionId - The mission to find the invite for (missionId or missionInviteId requried).
        missionInviteId - The mission invite id. This checks on the user's billable for permission (missionId or missionInviteId requried).
        includeGameData - Include the game level data with the mission.
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse< MissionResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeMissionInvite

        public WrappedResponse<MissionResponse> removeMissionInvite(Long accountId,
                                                   Long missionId,
                                                   Long missionInviteId,
                                                   Boolean includeGameData)
                                                     throws SirqulException
        Update the mission invite status to quit.

        Target API Endpoint: /mission/invite/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically).
        missionId - The mission to find the invite for (missionId or missionInviteId requried).
        missionInviteId - The mission invite id. This checks on the user's billable for permission (missionId or missionInviteId requried).
        includeGameData - Include the game level data with the mission.
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse< MissionResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchMissionInvites

        public WrappedResponse<MissionResponse> searchMissionInvites(Long accountId,
                                                    String appKey,
                                                    AppVersion appVersion,
                                                    Long missionId,
                                                    List<Enums.MissionInviteStatus> status,
                                                    Long lastUpdated,
                                                    Integer start,
                                                    Integer limit,
                                                    String keyword,
                                                    Boolean filterByBillable,
                                                    Boolean includeGameData)
                                                      throws SirqulException
        Get a list of mission invites that the account has.

        Target API Endpoint: /mission/invite/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required).
        appKey - the app to retrieve the data for, use your application key.
        appVersion - the application version, used to version the game level data
        missionId - the mission id to filter on
        status - The invite status to filter for, comma separated list
        {AVAILABLE, PENDING, UPDATED, ACCEPTED, ACTIVE, QUIT, COMPLETED, PENDING_REVIEW, REJECTED}
        lastUpdated - Only return invites that have been updated since this date/time (long)
        start - The index into the record set to start with.
        limit - The total number of record to return.
        keyword - The keyword to search on.
        filterByBillable - filter results by the account's billable
        includeGameData - Include the game level data with the mission.
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a wrapped list of Enums.MissionInviteStatus, {AVAILABLE, PENDING, UPDATED, ACCEPTED, ACTIVE, QUIT, COMPLETED, PENDING_REVIEW, REJECTED} MissionResponse
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • sendChallengeInvite

        @Deprecated
public SirqulResponse sendChallengeInvite(Long accountId,
                                            Long missionId,
                                            Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                                            Long permissionableId,
                                            Enums.MissionInviteStatus status,
                                            Boolean returnAppResponse)
                                   throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see updateMissionInvite(java.lang.Long, java.lang.Long, java.lang.Long, com.sirqul.sdk.data.Enums.MissionInviteStatus, com.sirqul.sdk.data.Enums.PermissionableType, java.lang.Long, java.lang.Boolean).
        Send challenge invite. Returns SirqulResponse if returnAppResponse is null or false, returns AppResponse if true;
        Send challenge invite.

        Target API Endpoint: /challenge/invite
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        missionId - the mission id
        permissionableType - the permissionable type
        permissionableId - the permissionable id
        status - the status
        returnAppResponse - the return app response
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail or AppResponse if returnAppResponse is true.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateMissionInvite

        public WrappedResponse<MissionResponse> updateMissionInvite(Long accountId,
                                                   Long missionId,
                                                   Long missionInviteId,
                                                   Enums.MissionInviteStatus status,
                                                   Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                                                   Long permissionableId,
                                                   Boolean includeGameData)
                                                     throws SirqulException
        Update the mission invite status. An account can only be invited to a mission one time. For missions that require user submission and reviewing the permissionableType and permissionableId need to be provided.

        Target API Endpoint: /mission/invite/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically).
        missionId - The mission to find the invite for (missionId or missionInviteId requried).
        missionInviteId - The mission invite id. This checks on the user's billable for permission (missionId or missionInviteId requried).
        status - The invite status to filter for, comma separated list
        {AVAILABLE, PENDING, UPDATED, ACCEPTED, ACTIVE, QUIT, COMPLETED, PENDING_REVIEW, REJECTED}
        permissionableType - The type of item being modified by the mission.
        {ACCOUNT, GAMELEVEL, COLLECTION, ALBUM_CONTEST, THEME_DESCRIPTOR, ALBUM}
        permissionableId - The id of the item being modified by the mission.
        includeGameData - Include the game level data with the mission.
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse< MissionResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
